DOC.brief_summary: The study assess relative bioavailability bioefficacy cryptoxanthin ( CX ) beta-carotene ( BC ) food source increase breast milk carotenoid retinol concentration lactate Bangladeshi woman .
DOC.brief_title: Vitamin A Bioavailability Lactating Women With Marginal Vitamin A Status
DOC.detailed_description: The specific aim compare effect orange-fleshed sweet potato tangerine compare white-fleshed sweet potato vitamin A retinyl palmitate blood breast milk cryptoxanthin ( CX ) , beta-carotene ( BC ) , vitamin A ( VA ) concentration randomly assign lactate Bangladeshi woman one four treatment group 6 days/week 3 week . The investigator also compare relative vitamin A ( VA ) value BC CX food source compare mean change breast milk retinol concentration group receive tangerine ( CX ) orange-fleshed sweet potato ( BC ) mean change breast milk retinol group receive retinyl palmitate .
DOC.criteria: Healthy woman Dhaka , Bangladesh Lactating woman 2nd 3rd month lactation plan breastfeed least 6 month Breastfeeding one infant Age range 18 45 year Not pregnant Serum retinol concentration > 0.70 umol/L < 1.10 umol/L Normal concentration CRP ( < 10 mg/L ) At least one arm vein deem adequate blood collection , evaluate screen nurse . Willing consume test food daily 6 d/wk one month Health status compatible inclusion criterion , screen blood chemistry indicative vitamin A deficiency . Severe anemia ( Hb < 9 mg/dL ) Current pregnancy Must know allergy citrus fruit ( tangerines mandarin orange ) sweet potato Must obvious psychological sociological problemsâ€”such alcoholism , drug abuse , severe acute mental illness would influence ability sign inform consent agreement participate study duty activity
